channel.title: Items not dropping on death - pvm and pvp - PI
channel.description: i know that the bit of code i am looking for is the givelife part of the code, however i cannot locate this - i have been told its in playerassistant.java and when i try to search in there for givelife i cannot find it help please?

item.title: Items not dropping on death - pvm and pvp - PI
item.dc:creator: @mage_pwns mage pwns
item.description:
@mage_pwns wrote:

hmm the fun area pk u drop items when ur not supposed to so i’ve deleted that, could it be the coords of that area thats messed up, i’ll check, could you say which you do first like nw, ne sw se? please? long time since ive been in servers trying to get back into it lolz

EDIT: i just thought its not the fact that i dont drop items now, its the fact that the other person doesnt see the items apart from fire cape, barrows gloves and dragon bolts (e) so far as much as ive tested, ughh this is stressing me out now lolz

Read full topic
